document_data.name: Iron Body
document_data.mainbody: '''''Iron body''''' was a [[transmutation]] or [[alteration]] spell that turned the subject's body to living iron which, in turn, greatly enhanced some resistances and granted some new abilities.
document_data.Effects:
While under the effects of this spell, the target experienced the following effects:

* Increased strength
* Decreased speed, increased weight
* Decreased agility
* Lose the ability to consume liquids
* Cast all spells as if wearing a suite of [[plate mail]]
* Resistance to physical harm
* Immunity to all forms of deafness, blindness, disease, drowning, poison, electricity, and stun attacks
* Resistance to fire and acid
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell needed as a [[material component]] a small piece of [[iron]] that had once been part of an [[iron golem]], [[armor]] worn by a hero, or a war machine to cast.
